# cancel(_:)

**Instance Method**

The action method that the panel calls when the user clicks the Cancel button.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func cancel(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The `NSSavePanel` object that contains the Cancel button.

## Handling Actions

- **ok(_:)**: The action method that the panel calls when the user clicks the OK button.
